channel.title: Dan Scanlon on jverkamp.com
channel.description: Recent content in Dan Scanlon on jverkamp.com

item.title: Monsters University
item.description: Given how relatively few films they’ve put out, it’s fairly impressive how Pixar has already shown us that they know how to do a sequel well (Toy Story 2/3) and they’ve found out how to do it now quite so well (Cars 2). So how does Monsters University do?
